text: Ezɨ afeziam kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ mangɨ uan aveghbuabar ganigh fogh suam, me deraghavɨra ti, o puvatɨ? Egh uaghan sipsipbar ganigh fogh, da dera, o puvatɨ? Nɨ men ganigh, egh uamategh izɨ na mɨkemegh.” Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn Israelɨn adarasi, Hebronɨn danganir zarimɨn iti. Ezɨ Josep Sekemɨn nguibamɨn otogha gɨfa.
